name: Learn: Cells
description:
With Learn: Cells your kid will be able to learn about the animal and plant cells parts, spelling, and pronunciation. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

   -Touch the cell pictures or spelling to hear the pronunciation.

2. Challenge

   -Different challenge types. (Can be configured in settings)

   -Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.

   -Challenge types:

      -Match Word - Match the part of the cell image with the corresponding word spelling.

      -Match Image - Hear and see the word spelling, and match with the correct part of the cell image.

      -Group - Hear and see the word spelling of the part of the cell, and match where it is found (animal cell, plant cell, or both).

   -Cell parts to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
